Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • Messenger

  • public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the communication module between the front and back-end It is responsible for all method calls to the back-end, and responses to the front-end. -AG

    The Messenger holds drag information. It includes the source slot, dragged tile number, rotation and possibly x/y offsets from the mouse. -AC, MG

      • moveTile

        public boolean moveTile(int from,
                        int to)
        Calls back-end method which moves the tile from a given position to a given position. -AG No longer swaps tiles, now returns false on failure to move tiles. -AC, MG
        Parameters:
        from - Integer position of GameTile's original location
        to - Integer position of GameTile's new location
        Returns:
        true if move was successful

      • getTile

        public java.awt.Image getTile(BoardSide side,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Calls board.getTile which returns the ID of a tile in a given -MG position in the grid. -AG, MG
        Parameters:
        side - Position of tile among Left, center and right holders
        x - X coordinate of GameTile in holder
        y - Y coordinate of GameTile in holder
        Returns:
        Image of tile at given position or null if no tile present
